treatment_outcomes.openmrs_reference_term: INSERT INTO `openmrs`.`concept_reference_term` (`concept_source_id`, `name`, `code`, `creator`, `date_created`, `retired`, `uuid`) SELECT * FROM (SELECT (SELECT concept_source_id FROM concept_reference_source WHERE name='TBR'), 'cured' name, 'cured' code, 1 creator, NOW() created, 0 retired, UUID() uuid) as tmp WHERE NOT EXISTS (  SELECT code FROM concept_reference_term WHERE code = 'cured' ) LIMIT 1;
treatment_outcomes.name: cured

label.Roman Urdu: Shehr: ${provider_city} ; Town: ${provider_town} ; UC: ${provider_uc} ; Center ka naam: ${provider_location_name}

label.English: If yes, for how long have you been coughing?

label.Roman Urdu: Kya aapki khaasi mein balgam ati hai?
label.English: Do you currently cough up phlegm or sputum?

label.Roman Urdu: Kya aapki khaasi mein khoon ata hai?
label.English: Do you currently cough up blood?

label.Roman Urdu: Kya aapko seeney mein dard mehsoos hota hai?
label.English: Do you currently have chest pain?
Do you currently have a fever?

label.Roman Urdu: Kya aapko thandey paseeney atey hain?
label.English: Do you currently have drenching night sweats (so that you have to change your bedclothes)?

label.Roman Urdu: Kya aapka wazan bohut tezi se gir raha hai?
label.English: In the past month, have you unexpectedly lost weight?

label.Roman Urdu: Kya aapko koi aur alamaat hain?
label.English: Do you currently have any other symptoms(s)?

bind.calculate: if(${cough}='yes' or ${chest_pain}='yes' or ${cough_phlegm}='yes' or ${fever}='yes' or ${night_sweats}='yes' or ${weight_loss}='yes' or ${haemoptysis}='yes','yes','no')

label.Roman Urdu: Kya iss mareez ko TB hai?
label.English: Does this person have TB symptoms?

jr:constraintMsg.English: Must be at least a year old and less than 150 years of age
Maximum 20 digits and cannot contain anything other than number

label.Roman Urdu: Kya aapke kissi kareebi dost ya rishtedaar ko TB howa hai?
label.English: Have you ever been in close contact with someone who was sick with TB?

label.Roman Urdu: Kya aapne kabhi TB ka ilaaj karwaya hai?
label.English: Have you ever taken TB treatment for more than one month?

label.Roman Urdu: Agar haan, tou uska nateja kya tha?
label.English: If yes, what was the outcome of your previous TB treatment?

label.Roman Urdu: ilaaj ke liye koi aur jagah ruju kiya
Kya aapne HIV ka test pishley 6 mahino mein karwaya hai?
label.English: Have you had an HIV test in the past?
If yes, what is your HIV status?

jr:constraintMsg.Roman Urdu: Phone number 11 hindason par mushtamil aur mundarja zail shakal main hona chahiey: 03*********
jr:constraintMsg.English: Phone number should be 11 digits in the following format: 03*********

children.name: union_council
children.choice_filter: (province=${province} and city=${city_village} and town=${town}) or town='na'
